summary: Makes Ash Weapons playable and craftable!
descriptionHtml:
This simple mod allow you to play with ash weapons. It can be crafted at any forge or can ba found near Miraak\\\'s tample.


There are two extra weapons:
Ash Axe- Deals 25 damage + fire damage
Ash War Axe - Deals 40 damage + fire damage



To craft it you need a perk \\\"ebony armor\\\", forged in the \\\"Draugr\\\"

Craft:
Axe: A stone-core, ash, Ebony ingot.

War Axe: 2 stone-core, spriggan wood scorched, ebony ingot, 3 ash.

Requirements:

DLC Dragonborn, Skyrim 1.8

Installation:

Put the files in a data folder, activate in the launcher.

P.S.) My english is owful, i know)
author: artuom631
